text:
This is stumping me. How do I mark a model as clean? All the advice here seems out of date:

<http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13342250/how-to-manually-set-an-object-state-to-clean-saved-using-ember-data>

attachments.title: How to manually set an object state to clean (saved) using ember-data
attachments.text: Explanation: I'm using ember-data for a project of mine and I have a question that revolves around the possibility of dirtying an object and then setting its state to clean again on purpose - with...
attachments.fallback: How to manually set an object state to clean (saved) using ember-data

text: figured out a workaround, using store.push to update those attributes :confused:
